text: Aur Madiyan walon ki taraf humne unke bhai Shoaib ko bheja. Usne kaha â€œaey meri qaum ke logon, Allah ki bandagi karo, uske siwa tumhara koi khuda nahin hai. Aur naap toal mein kami na kiya karo. Aaj main tumko acchey haal mein dekh raha hoon, magar mujhey darr hai ke kal tumpar aisa din aayega jiska azaab sabko gher lega
